segments.text: Susan , Did you know the four ugliest women in ancient China ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I only know four great beauties of China .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There were some famous ugly women in history .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah ? Were they famous because of the ugliness ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Though they were ugly , they had great virtue .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mo Mu , Thong Lichen , Meng Gang and Ran Nv . They were well respected .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It seems that the inner beauty is also important .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sometimes the inner beauty is more beautiful .
segments.speaker: S1
